      • setParam

        public void setParam(String name,
                     long value,
                     boolean encrypt)
              throws CoinStackException
        Set a value into parameter(s) with name. If want to encrypt the value of the parameter(s), set 'true' at the last.
        Parameters:
        name - parameter name
        value - input value
        encrypt - encrypt value, or not
        Throws:
        CoinStackException

      • setParam

        public void setParam(String name,
                     String value,
                     boolean encrypt,
                     boolean noquot)
              throws CoinStackException
        Set a value into parameter(s) with name. If want to encrypt the value of the parameter(s), set 'true' for 'encrypt' parameter. If want to set the value without quotations, set 'true' for 'noquot' parameter. ex) setParam(1, "123", false, true); getParam(1) --> 123 ex) setParam(1, "123", false, false); getParam(1) --> "123"
        Parameters:
        name - parameter name
        value - input value
        encrypt - encrypt value, or not
        noquot - except quotations, or not
        Throws:
        CoinStackException

      • setParam

        public void setParam(int idx,
                     long value)
              throws CoinStackException
        Set a value into the 'idx'-th parameter, index starts at 1.
        Parameters:
        idx - index of parameter(s)
        value - input value
        Throws:
        CoinStackException

        public void setParam(int idx,
                     long value,
                     boolean encrypt)
              throws CoinStackException
        Set a value into the 'idx'-th parameter, index starts at 1. If want to encrypt the value of the parameter, set 'true' at the last.
        Parameters:
        idx - index of parameter(s)
        value - input value
        encrypt - encrypt value, or not
        Throws:
        CoinStackException

      • setParam

        public void setParam(int idx,
                     String value,
                     boolean encrypt,
                     boolean noquot)
              throws CoinStackException
        Set a value into the 'idx'-th parameter, index starts at 1. If want to encrypt the value of the parameter, set 'true' for 'encrypt' parameter. If want to set the value without quotations, set 'true' for 'noquot' parameter.
        Parameters:
        name - parameter name
        value - input value
        encrypt - encrypt value, or not
        noquot - set quotations, or not
        Throws:
        CoinStackException

      • getParam

        public LuaContractCode.Parameter getParam(int idx)
        get an instance of the 'Parameter' class at the 'idx'-th parameter.
        Parameters:
        idx - index of parameter
        Returns:
        instance of 'Parameter' class
